```{r setup}
library(testthat)
library(matrixR)
context("Test tr.")
```


## Results


```{r results}
A <- matrix(
  data = c(
    1, 11, 6,
    0, 5, 12,
    3, 2, -5
  ),
  ncol = 3
)
x <- tr(A)
x
```



```{r testhat}
test_that("tr.", {
  expect_equal(
    1,
    x,
    check.attributes = FALSE
  )
})
```
